title: Login form validation not working properly
description: When users enter invalid credentials, the error message doesn't appear. The form should show clear validation feedback for both email format and password requirements.

title: Dashboard charts not loading on mobile devices
description: The analytics charts on the main dashboard fail to render on mobile browsers. This affects user engagement and data accessibility for mobile users.

title: Search function returns duplicate results
description: The global search feature is returning duplicate entries in search results. This happens particularly with products that have multiple variants.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for important account updates, password resets, and order confirmations. SMTP configuration might need review.

title: Profile picture upload fails for large images
description: When users try to upload profile pictures larger than 2MB, the upload fails silently without any error message. Need to implement proper file size validation and compression.

title: Dark mode toggle not persisting across sessions
description: The dark mode preference resets to light mode every time users close and reopen the application. Theme preference should be saved in localStorage.

title: Shopping cart items disappear on page refresh
description: Items added to the shopping cart are lost when users refresh the page or navigate away and come back. Cart state should persist in session storage.

title: API response times are extremely slow
description: Database queries are taking 3-5 seconds to complete, especially for user profile and transaction history endpoints. Performance optimization needed urgently.

title: Export feature generates corrupted PDF files
description: When users try to export their data as PDF, the generated files are corrupted and cannot be opened. This affects report generation functionality.

title: Social media login buttons not working
description: Google and Facebook authentication buttons are non-functional. Users clicking on them see a blank page instead of the OAuth flow.

title: Responsive design breaks on tablet devices
description: The navigation menu and content layout don't adapt properly to tablet screen sizes (768px - 1024px). Elements overlap and become unusable.

title: Form auto-save feature causes browser crashes
description: The auto-save functionality for long forms is causing memory leaks and browser crashes, particularly in Chrome and Safari on MacOS.

title: Accessibility issues with keyboard navigation
description: Users cannot navigate through the application using only keyboard input. Missing focus indicators and improper tab order throughout the interface.

title: Payment processing fails with international cards
description: Credit cards issued outside the US are being rejected during checkout process. This is significantly impacting international sales and customer satisfaction.

title: Image gallery thumbnails not generating properly
description: Product image thumbnails are not being generated correctly, showing placeholder images instead. This affects the visual appeal of product listings.
